summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當類別初始化時，它會檢查是否有可能已使用選擇性的覆寫的組態項目的`config`建構函式中的參數。When the class is initialized, it checks for configuration entries that might have been overridden by using the optional `config` parameter in the constructor. 您可以傳遞下列參數在`config`參數。You can pass the following parameters in the `config` parameter. 所有的值可以傳遞為整數。All values can be passed as integers. - - - 叫用此建構函式時，從應用程式組態檔時，會先擷取組態設定。When this constructor is invoked, configuration settings are first retrieved from application configuration files. 如果沒有設定項目存在於應用程式組態檔中，只有設定中提供`config`會套用。If no configuration entries exist in the application configuration file, only the settings provided in `config` are applied. 如果應用程式組態中的組態項目存在，而且資訊也會在傳遞`config`中的資訊`config`覆寫會從組態檔讀取的資訊。If the configuration entries in the application configuration exist, and if information is also passed in `config`, the information in the `config` overrides the information that is read from the configuration file. 指派給快取執行個體的名稱值用於兩種方式：The name value that is assigned to a cache instance is used in two ways: - 若要協助您追蹤多個快取執行個體時存在一個以上的執行個體。To help you keep track of multiple cache instances when more than one instance exists. - 若要參考組態中的設定檔時初始化執行個體。To reference settings in the configuration file when the instance is initialized. > [!NOTE] > 沒有任何機制來強制執行快取執行個體的唯一名稱。There is no mechanism to enforce unique names for cache instances. 因此，就可能有多個具有相同名稱的快取執行個體。Therefore, it is possible to have multiple cache instances with the same name. > [!CAUTION] > 請勿建立除非必要，否則執行個體。Do not create instances unless it is required. 如果您在用戶端和 Web 應用程式，建立快取執行個體應該在應用程式生命週期的早期建立執行個體。If you create cache instances in client and Web applications, the instances should be created early in the application life cycle. 您必須建立只會用於您的應用程式，並可全域存取的變數中儲存的快取執行個體的參考快取執行個體數目。You must create only the number of cache instances that will be used in your application, and store references to the cache instances in variables that can be accessed globally. 例如，在 ASP.NET 應用程式，您可以儲存應用程式狀態中的參考。For example, in ASP.NET applications, you can store the references in application state. 如果您建立只能有單一快取執行個體應用程式中，使用預設快取，並取得它的參考屬性，當您需要存取快取。If you create only a single cache instance in your application, use the default cache and get a reference to it from the property when you need to access the cache.

summary.span: 將快取項目插入快取中做為 執行個體，並加入有關如何收回項目的詳細資料。

span.span: Inserts a cache entry into the cache as a instance, and adds details about how the entry should be evicted.

returns.span: 如果插入成功則為 true，如果快取中已經有項目具有與項目相同的索引鍵，則為 false。

span.span: true if insertion succeeded, or false if there is an already an entry in the cache that has the same key as item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!WARNING] > 和 方法多載不支援 屬性。The and method overloads do not support the property. 因此，若為快取項目設定 屬性，請改用 方法多載。Therefore, to set the property for a cache entry, use the method overloads instead.

summary.span: 將快取項目插入快取區中。

span.span: Inserts a cache entry into the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法多載可用來插入至快取的快取項目。The method overloads are used to insert a cache entry into the cache. 如果有相符的索引鍵的快取項目不存在，這些方法會插入新項目。If a cache entry with a matching key does not exist, these methods insert a new entry. 如果有相符的索引鍵的快取項目已經存在，就會傳回現有的項目。If a cache entry with a matching key already exists, they return the existing entry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `item`參數提供的索引鍵和值，方法使用。The `item` parameter supplies the key and the value that is used by the method. 如果快取具有相同索引鍵做為索引鍵的快取項目`item`參數，此方法會傳回現有的項目，做為執行個體。If the cache has a cache entry with the same key as the key of the `item` parameter, the method returns the existing entry as a instance. 如果沒有任何現有的快取項目，方法會建立一個新使用索引鍵與所提供的值`item`參數，且具有所指定的收回詳細資料`policy`。If there is no existing cache entry, the method creates a new one by using the key and value supplied by the `item` parameter, and with the eviction details specified by `policy`. > [!WARNING] > 和 方法多載不支援 屬性。The and method overloads do not support the property. 因此，若為快取項目設定 屬性，請改用 方法多載。Therefore, to set the property for a cache entry, use the method overloads instead.

MemberSignature.Value: public long CacheMemoryLimit { get; }
.property instance int64 CacheMemoryLimit
Public ReadOnly Property CacheMemoryLimit As Long
public: property long CacheMemoryLimit { long get(); };
member this.CacheMemoryLimit : int64

summary.span: 取得電腦上可供快取使用的記憶體數量 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: Gets the amount of memory on the computer, in bytes, that can be used by the cache.

value.span: 記憶體數量 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: The amount of memory in bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果快取的目前執行個體超過所設定的記憶體的限制屬性，快取實作移除快取項目。If the current instance of the cache exceeds the limit on memory set by the property, the cache implementation removes cache entries. 應用程式中的每個快取執行個體可以使用所指定的記憶體數量屬性。Each cache instance in the application can use the amount of memory that is specified by the property. 設定屬性可以指定應用程式組態檔中。The settings for the property can be specified in the application configuration file. 或者，他們可以傳入建構函式時類別初始化。Alternatively, they can be passed in the constructor when the class is initialized. 如需如何設定這個屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[ <namedCaches>項目 （快取設定）](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/namedcaches-element-cache-settings.md)。For more information about how to configure this property, see [<namedCaches> Element (Cache Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/namedcaches-element-cache-settings.md). 如需有關如何設定此值時類別初始化，請參閱方法。For more information about how to set this value when the class is being initialized, see the method. 不會立即強制中加入新項目每次執行個體。 does not instantly enforce each time a new item is added to a instance. 內部的啟發學習法的收回額外的項目從逐漸運作和記憶體回收行程列入帳戶資訊 (請參閱[回收](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md)) 和其他因素，例如目前的快取大小和整體系統記憶體不足的壓力。The internal heuristics which evicts extra items from the does it gradually and takes into account information from the garbage collector (see [Garbage Collection](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md)) and other factors such as current cache size and overall system memory pressure. 因此即使嘗試保留快取大小內設定可以暫時將快取項目加入非常高的速率超過限制。Therefore even though the tries to keep the cache size within the configured it is possible to temporarily exceed the limit by adding cache items at a very high rate.

summary.span: 建立 物件，該物件可觸發事件以回應指定快取項目的變更。

span.span: Creates a object that can trigger events in response to changes to specified cache entries.

returns.span: 監控快取區項目的變更監視器。

span.span: A change monitor that monitors entries in the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會建立執行個體。The method creates a instance. 此特製化的變更監視可用來監視中指定的快取項目`keys`集合和觸發程序事件時變更的項目。This specialized change monitor is used to monitor the cache entries that are specified in the `keys` collection and to trigger events when the entries change. 受監視的項目被視為已變更任何原因如下：A monitored entry is considered to have changed for any of the following reasons: - 索引鍵不存在時呼叫的方法。The key does not exist at the time of the call to the method. 在此情況下，產生設執行個體是立即變更狀態。In that case, the resulting instance is immediately set to a changed state. 這表示，當程式碼接著會繫結變更通知回呼，會立即觸發回呼。This means that when code subsequently binds a change-notification callback, the callback is triggered immediately. - 相關聯的快取項目已從快取移除。The associated cache entry was removed from the cache. 這可能明確移除的項目，如果它已過期，或是收回復原記憶體This can occur if the entry is explicitly removed, if it expires, or if it is evicted to recover memory

exception.span: 為 。

summary.span: 取得預設 執行個體的參考。

span.span: Gets a reference to the default instance.
The default instance of the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性永遠會傳回預設快取執行個體的參考。This property always returns a reference to the default cache instance. 一般應用程式案例中，只有一個執行個體需要。For typical application scenarios, only one instance of is required. 建構函式不會建立預設快取執行個體，因為您必須使用組態來明確設定的記憶體和輪詢值的預設快取執行個體。Because the default cache instance is not created by the constructor, you must use configuration to explicitly set the memory and polling values for the default cache instance. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ <memoryCache>項目 （快取設定）](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/memorycache-element-cache-settings.md)。For more information, see [<memoryCache> Element (Cache Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/memorycache-element-cache-settings.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public void Dispose ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
Public Sub Dispose ()
public: virtual void Dispose();
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 將 類別的目前執行個體所使用的資源全部釋出。

span.span: Releases all resources that are used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個執行個體繫結至事件。Each instance is bound to the event. 不過，應用程式定義域關閉期間如果未明確處置記憶體為基礎的快取，快取執行個體將會自動呼叫方法。However, during application-domain shutdown, if a memory-based cache has not been explicitly disposed, the cache instance will automatically call the method. 已處置的快取執行個體關閉時使用下列步驟：The disposed cache instance is shut down using the following steps: 1. 快取的狀態設定為指出快取已處置。The state of the cache is set to indicate that the cache is disposed. 任何嘗試呼叫公用快取變更快取中，狀態的方法等方法，加入、 移除或擷取快取項目，可能會導致非預期的行為。Any attempt to call public caching methods that change the state of the cache, such as methods that add, remove, or retrieve cache entries, might cause unexpected behavior. 例如，如果您呼叫方法處置快取後，任何作業就會發生錯誤。For example, if you call the method after the cache is disposed, a no-op error occurs. 如果您嘗試從快取中擷取項目方法一定會傳回`null`。If you attempt to retrieve items from the cache, the method will always return `null`. 2. 效能計數器資訊不會再引發目前的快取執行個體。Performance counter information is no longer raised from the current cache instance. 3. 會釋放目前快取執行個體所持有的快取物件的所有參考。All references to cached objects held by the current cache instance are released. 4. 任何監視快取中的項目目前的執行個體將會收到通知。Any instances that are currently monitoring entries in the cache are notified. 5. 提供變更通知的那些監視器的回呼物件會呼叫。Callback objects that provide notification of changes for those monitors are called. 6. 任何稱為已登錄至快取中的項目執行個體。Any instances that are registered with entries in the cache are called. 傳遞給回呼的移除原因是。The removal reason that is passed to the callbacks is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回可供的單一執行個體的總實體電腦記憶體的百分比類別。The property returns the percentage of total physical computer memory that can be used by a single instance of the class. 如果快取執行個體超過指定的限制，則會移除快取項目。If the cache instance exceeds the specified limit, cache entries are removed. 設定屬性可以指定應用程式組態檔中。The settings for the property can be specified in the application configuration file. 或者，傳遞它們由呼叫端時類別初始化。Alternatively, they can be passed by a caller when the class is initialized. 如需如何設定這個屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[ <namedCaches>項目 （快取設定）](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/namedcaches-element-cache-settings.md)。For more information about how to configure this property, see [<namedCaches> Element (Cache Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/namedcaches-element-cache-settings.md). 如需有關如何設定屬性時類別初始化，請參閱方法。For more information about how to configure the property when the class is being initialized, see the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的項目不存在，則會建立它。If the specified entry does not exist, it is created. 如果指定的項目存在，它會更新。If the specified entry exists, it is updated.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Set (System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItem item, System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItemPolicy policy);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Set(class System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItem item, class System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItemPolicy policy) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Set (item As CacheItem, policy As CacheItemPolicy)
public: override void Set(System::Runtime::Caching::CacheItem ^ item, System::Runtime::Caching::CacheItemPolicy ^ policy);
override this.Set : System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItem * System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItemPolicy -> unit

param.name: item
param.span: 物件，表示要插入的快取項目。

span.span: An object that represents a cache entry to insert.

param.name: policy
param.span: 物件，包含快取項目的收回詳細資料。

span.span: An object that contains eviction details for the cache entry.

param.span: 這個物件提供的收回選項比簡單絕對期限要多。

span.span: This object provides more options for eviction than a simple absolute expiration.

summary.span: 使用 執行個體提供快取項目所需的索引鍵和值，以在快取中插入快取項目。

span.span: Inserts a cache entry into the cache by using a instance to supply the key and value for the cache entry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就像其他方法多載，方法一律會置於快取值快取，不論是否項目已經存在具有相同索引鍵。Like other method overloads, the method always puts a cache value in the cache, regardless whether an entry already exists that has the same key. 如果指定的項目不存在於快取中，插入新的快取項目。If the specified entry does not exist in the cache, a new cache entry is inserted. 如果指定的項目已經存在，則會更新其值。If the specified entry already exists, its value is updated.

exception.span: 為 。

span.span: -or- The property is .

exception.span: 傳遞的快取項目引數組合無效。

span.span: An invalid combination of arguments for the cache entry was passed.

exception.span: 如果在快取項目的原則物件上設定下列期限詳細資料，就會發生這個狀況：- 如果 物件的絕對和滑動期限值都設定為 和 欄位之預設值以外的值。

span.span: This occurs if the following expiration details are set on the policy object for the cache entry: - If both the absolute and sliding expiration values of the object are set to values other than the defaults of and fields.

exception.span: 類別不能根據絕對期限和滑動期限來設定到期原則。

span.span: The class cannot set expiration policy based on both an absolute expiration and a sliding expiration.

exception.span: 當您使用 類別時，只能明確設定一個到期設定。

span.span: Only one expiration setting can be explicitly set when you use the class.

exception.span: 其他設定必須設定為 或 屬性。

span.span: The other setting must be set to or property.

exception.span: - 如果同時指定 物件的移除回呼和更新回呼。

span.span: - If both the removal callback and the update callback are specified for object.

exception.span: 類別只支援對每個快取項目使用一種回呼。

span.span: The class only supports using one type of callback per cache entry.

exception.span: 屬性設定為小於 的值。

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Set (string key, object value, DateTimeOffset absoluteExpiration, string regionName = null);

override this.Set : string * obj * DateTimeOffset * string -> unit

param.name: key
param.span: 要插入之快取項目的唯一識別項。

span.span: A unique identifier for the cache entry to insert.

param.name: value
param.span: 快取項目的資料。

span.span: The data for the cache entry.

param.name: absoluteExpiration
param.span: 快取項目到期的固定日期和時間。

span.span: The fixed date and time at which the cache entry will expire.

param.name: regionName
param.span: 快取區中的具名區域，快取項目可以加入至這個區域。

span.span: A named region in the cache to which a cache entry can be added.

param.span: 請勿傳遞這個參數的值。

span.span: Do not pass a value for this parameter.

param.span: 這個參數預設為 ，因為 類別沒有實作區域。

span.span: This parameter is by default, because the class does not implement regions.

summary.span: 使用索引鍵、值並指定以時間為基礎的到期詳細資訊，在快取區中插入快取項目。

span.span: Inserts a cache entry into the cache by using a key and a value and specifies time-based expiration details.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就像其他方法多載，方法一律會置於快取值快取中，無論是否已存在具有相同索引鍵的項目。Like other method overloads, the method always puts a cache value in the cache, regardless whether an entry already exists with the same key. 如果指定的項目不存在，則會插入新的快取項目。If the specified entry does not exist, a new cache entry is inserted. 如果指定的項目存在，它會更新。If the specified entry exists, it is updated. `absoluteExpiration`參數會指出何時會從快取中移除項目。The `absoluteExpiration` parameter indicates when the entry should be removed from the cache. 移除項目會觸發任何相關聯的異動監視器。Removing an entry triggers any associated change monitors. 如果移除的項目與物件或物件中包含的原因傳遞給回呼的移除屬性。If the removed item was associated with a object or object, the reason for removal that is passed to the callbacks is contained in the property.

span.span: This occurs if the following expiration details are set on the policy object for the cache entry: - If both the absolute and sliding expiration values on object are set to values other than the defaults of and .

exception.span: 此狀況會發生是因為 類別不支援以絕對期限和滑動期限為基礎的過期項目。

span.span: This occurs because the class does not support expiring entries based on both an absolute and a sliding expiration.

exception.span: 當您使用 類別時，只能明確設定一個到期設定。

span.span: Only one expiration setting can be explicitly set when you use the class.

exception.span: 其他設定必須設定為 或 。

span.span: The other setting must be set to or .

span.span: The class only supports using one type of callback per cache entry.

summary.span: 使用索引鍵、值和清除，在快取區中插入快取項目。

span.span: Inserts a cache entry into the cache by using a key and a value and eviction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就像其他方法多載，方法一律會置於快取值快取，不論是否符合的項目已經存在。Like other method overloads, the method always puts a cache value in the cache, regardless whether a matching entry already exists. 如果指定的項目不存在於快取中，插入新的快取項目。If the specified entry does not exist in the cache, a new cache entry is inserted. 如果指定的項目存在，它會更新。If the specified entry exists, it is updated. 移除項目會觸發任何相關聯的異動監視器。Removing an entry triggers any associated change monitors. 如果移除的項目與物件或物件中包含的原因傳遞給回呼的移除屬性。If the removed item was associated with a object or object, the reason for removal that is passed to the callbacks is contained in the property.

summary.span: 提供在泛型集合上執行反覆項目的支援。

span.span: Provides support for iteration over a generic collection.

returns.span: 列舉程式物件，可用來存取快取區的項目。

span.span: The enumerator object that provides access to the entries in the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它可用時，才執行個體轉換成介面。It can be used only when a instance is cast to an interface. 您可以使用這個方法來逐一查看快取項目的一般集合。You can use this method to iterate through a generic collection of cache entries.

MemberSignature.Value: public long Trim (int percent);
.method public hidebysig instance int64 Trim(int32 percent) cil managed
Public Function Trim (percent As Integer) As Long
public: long Trim(int percent);
member this.Trim : int -> int64

param.name: percent
param.span: 移除項目的數目在快取項目總數中所佔的百分比。

span.span: The percentage of total cache entries to remove.

summary.span: 從快取物件移除指定百分比的快取項目。

span.span: Removes a specified percentage of cache entries from the cache object.

returns.span: 從快取區中移除的項目數量。

span.span: The number of entries removed from the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性第一次移除項目，已超過的絕對或滑動期限。The property first removes entries that have exceeded either an absolute or sliding expiration. 任何移除的項目會傳遞給已移除的原因已註冊的回呼。Any callbacks that are registered for items that are removed will be passed a removed reason of . 如果不足以連線到指定的修剪百分比移除過期的項目，其他項目會從根據最少最近使用的 (LRU) 演算法，直到達到所要求的修剪百分比快取。If removing expired entries is insufficient to reach the specified trim percentage, additional entries will be removed from the cache based on a least-recently used (LRU) algorithm until the requested trim percentage is reached. 會傳遞給任何項目，則這種方式移除已註冊的回呼的移除原因。Any callbacks that are registered for items that are removed this way will be passed a remove reason of .
